options.name: Beginner Ranger
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Ranged Weapons

options.name: Distant Shooting
options.description: Gain +2 Maximum Units of Range on all Ranged Weapons

options.name: Novice Ranger
options.description: Increase Maximum range on all Ranged Weapons by 2 Units and reduce minimal range by 1 unit and gain +1 Attack with Ranged Weapons

options.name: Reaction : Cover Fire
options.description: If an Ally is being Attacked in range of your Ranged Weapon, you can shoot 3 Ammunition in quick succession at a Creature lowering their Attack roll by 1d4.

options.name: Stance of the Marksman
options.description: You learn the Marksmans Focus Stance

options.name: Journeyman Ranger
options.description: Gain +1 Attack and +1 Damage with Ranged Weapons

options.name: Action : Headshot
options.description: You make a Ranged Attack dealing an extra 1d10 Damage and increasing your True Hit threshold by 1. The bonus becomes 2d10 on a True Hit.

options.name: Action : Steady Aim
options.description: You gain a +2 Attack with Ranged Weapons until the end of your next turn. If you Move or are Displaced, this effect ends.

options.name: Expert Ranger
options.description: Gain Critical Hits and Gain +1 Attack with Ranged Weapons

options.name: Free Action : Shoot and Scoot
options.description: When you make a Ranged Attack, you can move 2 Units.

options.name: Action : Burst Shot
options.description: You shoot 3 of your ammunition in rapid succession, each with a -2 Attack Penalty. You can target seperate Creatures with this Attack

options.name: Master Ranger
options.description: Gain Brutal Critical Hits with Ranged Weapons and Gain +1 Attack and Damage with Ranged Weapons

options.name: Velocity
options.description: Gain +2 Maximum Units of Range on all Ranged Weapons and +1 Damage with Ranged Weapons

options.name: Action : Powershot
options.description: You make a Ranged Attack at half your normal Range. This shot gains a +3 Attack Modifier, your True Hit threshold is increased by 1, and the Damage bypasses Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Grandmaster Ranger
options.description: Your Damage Die for Ranged Weapons are upgraded (Ultra-Light Ranged: 1d10, Light Ranged: 2d6, Heavy Ranged 3d6)
